name: Unravel (itch) (Yosmi)
description:
Brief: Unravel is a game about creating or destroying beings by massaging a volcano. To let there be or not, is that the question? Before answering, however, please message the volcano.

Control: Use the left mouse button to click/drag for massaging.

Credits:

  • Yuefeng He, Game Designer and Programmer
  • Albert “You” Liang, Game Designer and Producer,
  • Nana Kawabata, Game Designer and Artist,
  • Riko Imai, Game Designer and Artist
  • Christa Duggan, Composer
